channel.title: CVE Feed for Autodesk -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Autodesk -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-37008|2024-08-26T12:44:55.475Z -- autodesk -- revit
item.description: A maliciously crafted DWG file, when parsed in Revit, can force a stack-based buffer overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-7305|2024-08-21T15:25:35.299Z -- autodesk -- autocad
item.description: A maliciously crafted DWF file, when parsed in AdDwfPdk.dll through Autodesk AutoCAD, can force an Out-of-Bounds Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23138|2024-08-05T13:43:04.862Z -- autodesk -- dwg%20trueview
item.description: A maliciously crafted DWG file when parsed through Autodesk DWG TrueView can be used to cause a Stack-based Overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37003|2024-08-02T03:43:50.579Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted DWG and SLDPRT file, when parsed in opennurbs.dll and ODXSW_DLL.dll through Autodesk applications, can be used to cause a Stack-based Overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37001|2024-08-02T03:43:50.467Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: [A maliciously crafted 3DM file, when parsed in opennurbs.dll through Autodesk applications, can be used to cause a Heap-based Overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37007|2024-08-02T03:43:50.671Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted X_B and X_T file, when parsed in pskernel.DLL through Autodesk applications, can cause a use-after-free vulnerability. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, could lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-36999|2024-08-02T03:43:50.596Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted 3DM file, when parsed in opennurbs.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bounds Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, write sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37006|2024-08-02T03:43:50.517Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted CATPRODUCT file, when parsed in CC5Dll.dll through Autodesk applications, can lead to a memory corruption vulnerability by write access violation. This vulnerability, in conjunction with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37000|2024-08-02T03:43:50.657Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted X_B file, when parsed in pskernel.DLL through Autodesk applications, can lead to a memory corruption vulnerability by write access violation. This vulnerability, in conjunction with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37004|2024-08-02T03:43:50.581Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted SLDPRT file, when parsed in ASMKERN229A.dll through Autodesk applications, can cause a use-after-free vulnerability. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, could lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37002|2024-08-02T03:43:50.523Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted MODEL file, when parsed in ASMkern229A.dllthrough Autodesk applications, can be used to uninitialized variables. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, could lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37005|2024-08-02T03:43:50.683Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted X_B and X_T file, when parsed in pskernel.DLL through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bound Read. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23159|2024-06-27T20:34:05.942Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted STP file, when parsed in stp_aim_x64_vc15d.dll through Autodesk applications, can be used to uninitialized variables. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23150|2024-06-27T20:32:16.056Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted PRT file, when parsed in odxug_dll.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bounds Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.description: A maliciously crafted MODEL file, when parsed in libodx.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bounds Read. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23157|2024-06-27T20:33:37.827Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted SLDASM or SLDPRT file, when parsed in ODXSW_DLL.dll through Autodesk applications, can lead to a memory corruption vulnerability by write access violation. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the current process.

item.description: A maliciously crafted MODEL file, when parsed in atf_asm_interface.dll through Autodesk applications, can be used to cause a Heap-based Buffer Overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23144|2024-06-25T02:10:02.389Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted CATPART file, when parsed in CC5Dll.dll and ASMBASE228A.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bound Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23141|2024-06-25T01:22:38.407Z -- autodesk -- autodesk%20applications
item.description: A maliciously crafted MODEL file, when parsed in libodxdll through Autodesk applications, can cause a double free. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23142|2024-06-25T01:24:02.359Z -- autodesk -- autodesk%20applications
item.description: A maliciously crafted CATPART, STP, and MODEL file, when parsed in atf_dwg_consumer.dll, rose_x64_vc15.dll and libodxdll through Autodesk applications, can cause a use-after-free vulnerability. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23143|2024-06-25T02:05:33.461Z -- autodesk -- autodesk%20applications
item.description: A maliciously crafted 3DM, MODEL and X_B file, when parsed in ASMkern229A.dll and ASMBASE229A.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bound Read and/or Out-of-Bound Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23139|2024-03-17T23:58:50.884Z -- autodesk -- fbx%20review
item.description: An Out-Of-Bounds Write Vulnerability in Autodesk FBX Review version 1.5.3.0 and prior may lead to code execution or information disclosure through maliciously crafted ActionScript Byte Code “ABC” files. ABC files are created by the Flash compiler and contain executable code. This vulnerability in conjunction with other vulnerabilities could lead to code execution in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23138|2024-03-17T23:57:19.201Z -- autodesk -- dwg%20trueview
item.description: A maliciously crafted DWG file when parsed through Autodesk DWG TrueView can be used to cause a Stack-based Overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23141|2024-06-25T13:49:33.135Z -- autodesk -- autodesk%20applications
item.description: A maliciously crafted MODEL file, when parsed in libodxdll through Autodesk applications, can cause a double free. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37000|2024-06-25T13:23:40.959Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted X_B file, when parsed in pskernel.DLL through Autodesk applications, can lead to a memory corruption vulnerability by write access violation. This vulnerability, in conjunction with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23144|2024-06-25T13:31:22.080Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted CATPART file, when parsed in CC5Dll.dll and ASMBASE228A.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bound Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23149|2024-06-25T13:18:20.449Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted SLDDRW file, when parsed in ODXSW_DLL.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bound Read. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23154|2024-06-25T15:05:55.662Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted SLDPRT file, when parsed in ODXSW_DLL.dll through Autodesk applications, can be used to cause a Heap-based Overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23156|2024-06-26T19:17:50.940Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted 3DM file, when parsed in opennurbs.dll and ASMkern229A.dll through Autodesk applications, can lead to a memory corruption vulnerability by write access violation. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37007|2024-06-26T19:12:43.909Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted X_B and X_T file, when parsed in pskernel.DLL through Autodesk applications, can cause a use-after-free vulnerability. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, could lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-36999|2024-06-26T19:18:29.026Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted 3DM file, when parsed in opennurbs.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bounds Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, write sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23159|2024-08-01T22:59:31.524Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted STP file, when parsed in stp_aim_x64_vc15d.dll through Autodesk applications, can be used to uninitialized variables. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23155|2024-08-01T22:59:31.298Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted MODEL file, when parsed in atf_asm_interface.dll through Autodesk applications, can be used to cause a Heap-based Buffer Overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23148|2024-08-01T22:59:32.154Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted CATPRODUCT file, when parsed in CC5Dll.dll through Autodesk applications, can lead to a memory corruption vulnerability by write access violation. This vulnerability, in conjunction with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23158|2024-08-01T22:59:31.445Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted IGES file, when parsed in ASMImport229A.dll through Autodesk applications, can be used to cause a use-after-free vulnerability. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23146|2024-08-01T22:59:31.702Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted X_B and X_T file, when parsed in pskernel.DLL through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bound Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23138|2024-08-01T22:59:30.676Z -- autodesk -- dwg%20trueview
item.description: A maliciously crafted DWG file when parsed through Autodesk DWG TrueView can be used to cause a Stack-based Overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23143|2024-08-01T22:59:31.730Z -- autodesk -- autodesk%20applications
item.description: A maliciously crafted 3DM, MODEL and X_B file, when parsed in ASMkern229A.dll and ASMBASE229A.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bound Read and/or Out-of-Bound Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23141|2024-08-01T22:59:31.764Z -- autodesk -- autodesk%20applications
item.description: A maliciously crafted MODEL file, when parsed in libodxdll through Autodesk applications, can cause a double free. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23140|2024-08-01T22:59:31.701Z -- autodesk -- autodesk%20applications
item.description: A maliciously crafted 3DM and MODEL file, when parsed in opennurbs.dll and atf_api.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bound Read. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23156|2024-08-01T22:59:32.153Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted 3DM file, when parsed in opennurbs.dll and ASMkern229A.dll through Autodesk applications, can lead to a memory corruption vulnerability by write access violation. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23142|2024-08-01T22:59:31.470Z -- autodesk -- autodesk%20applications
item.description: A maliciously crafted CATPART, STP, and MODEL file, when parsed in atf_dwg_consumer.dll, rose_x64_vc15.dll and libodxdll through Autodesk applications, can cause a use-after-free vulnerability. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23157|2024-08-01T22:59:31.791Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted SLDASM or SLDPRT file, when parsed in ODXSW_DLL.dll through Autodesk applications, can lead to a memory corruption vulnerability by write access violation. This vulnerability, along with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23147|2024-08-01T22:59:31.741Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted CATPART, X_B and STEP, when parsed in ASMKERN228A.dll and ASMKERN229A.dll through Autodesk applications, can lead to a memory corruption vulnerability by write access violation. This vulnerability, in conjunction with other vulnerabilities, can lead to code execution in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23144|2024-08-01T22:59:31.414Z -- autodesk -- autocad%2C%20advance%20steel%20and%20civil%203d
item.description: A maliciously crafted CATPART file, when parsed in CC5Dll.dll and ASMBASE228A.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bound Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-23139|2024-08-01T22:59:30.714Z -- autodesk -- fbx%20review
item.description: An Out-Of-Bounds Write Vulnerability in Autodesk FBX Review version 1.5.3.0 and prior may lead to code execution or information disclosure through maliciously crafted ActionScript Byte Code “ABC” files. ABC files are created by the Flash compiler and contain executable code. This vulnerability in conjunction with other vulnerabilities could lead to code execution in the context of the current process.

item.description: A maliciously crafted PRT file, when parsed in odxug_dll.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bounds Write. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.description: A maliciously crafted MODEL file, when parsed in libodx.dll through Autodesk applications, can force an Out-of-Bounds Read. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to cause a crash, read sensitive data, or execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2024-37008|2024-08-21T10:02:21.128Z -- autodesk -- revit
item.description: A maliciously crafted DWG file, when parsed in Revit, can force a stack-based buffer overflow. A malicious actor can leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.
